channel.title: Gambling Clan
channel.description:
Anyone interested in creating a gambling clan similar to the dicing one we had some months ago? Games would mostly consist of the many variations of the seal game, such as:
1) Blackjack, but with 12 instead of 21. Multiplier usually 2.5x 2) Seal game: player chooses a number between 1-6. Multiplier 4x 3) Odd/even: player picks odd (1, 3, 5) or even (2, 4, 6). Multiplier 2x 4) Small/big: 1-3 small, 4-6 big. Multiplier 2x
Another popular game is hot/cold, where the result depends on the flower's color which comes from the ground (hot 3 colors, cold 3 colors, also one rainbow and black and white with which the host wins)
And this would be primarily for MSCP users, so bear in mind that by being a part of this clan might risk your account getting banned (although very unlikely :)).

Nobody on mopar is really rich other than " - "-rs name, who is a host in dragon dyce, so it would be too easy to be able to be scammed.
[/quote]He isn’t a dragon dyce host… He did slayer and pvm. Also, never post peoples usernames on here without permission, which, as far as I can tell, you don’t have.[/quote]
People always said he was :o I guess people lead me to false accusations. lol

item.title: Gambling Clan
item.dc:creator: @Pink_Phat Pink Phat
item.description:
@Pink_Phat wrote:

It wouldn’t require any money. We could do wagers. Where we, the host, keep 10% commision. Basically, two players bet on you.
For example.
Host: Hosting seal game wagers x2.
Player 1: Ooh, sounds fun, i’ll bet 500k on 3!
Host: Okay, join my fc.
Host in fc: Seal game 500k on 3!
Player 2: 500k on 3? Okay, here, 500k on 5.
Host, lets go then!
Does emote, lands on two.
Redo, until it lands on 5 or 3.
This would have to be two times the bet only, but would put scamming levels to a minimum!
Pm me on rs if you want some help,
Rs name: Defuzeer.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Anyone interested in creating a gambling clan similar to the dicing one we had some months ago? Games would mostly consist of the many variations of the seal game, such as:

  1. Blackjack, but with 12 instead of 21. Multiplier usually 2.5x
  2. Seal game: player chooses a number between 1-6. Multiplier 4x
  3. Odd/even: player picks odd (1, 3, 5) or even (2, 4, 6). Multiplier 2x
  4. Small/big: 1-3 small, 4-6 big. Multiplier 2x

Another popular game is hot/cold, where the result depends on the flower’s color which comes from the ground (hot 3 colors, cold 3 colors, also one rainbow and black and white with which the host wins)

And this would be primarily for MSCP users, so bear in mind that by being a part of this clan might risk your account getting banned (although very unlikely :)).
